attributes.action: GIVE PUBLIC A REFERENDUM ON IMMIGRATION CONTROL
attributes.additional_details:
WE WANT THE GOVERNMENT TO GIVE US A VOTE ON HOW IMMIGRATION IS DEALT WITH. WE WANT THE GOVERNMENT TO ASK US :-
1) SHOULD BORDERFORCE TURN IMMIGRANT BOATS BACK IMMEDIATELY AND NOT BRING THEM ASHORE
2) SHOULD WE ALLOW TAX PAYERS MONEY TO BE USED TO HOUSE ILLEGAL IMMIGRANTS
3) SHOULD IMMIGRANTS GET THE SAME BENEFITS AS BRITISH CITIZENS
attributes.background: WE WANT THE GOVERNMENT TO GIVE US A VOTE ON HOW TO DEAL WITH ILLEGAL IMMIGRATION

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about immigration, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Non-UK citizens already have limited rights to benefits, and only have housing paid for in certain circumstances.

If you are concerned about illegal attempts to enter the UK you might like to sign the following petition:

Take action to prevent illegal attempts to enter the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/579552
